website_summaries.verdict: A simple and functional way to carry your mat without having to mess with a bag.
pros: Metal rings help to tighten the strap on your mat
Stays on the mat well when you're carrying it
Strap doesn't cut into your shoulder
cons: Has a tendency to let the mat roll open if you set it down

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay closed.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this is not a good strap. It's well made and looks great but that's where it ends. The strap will not hold the mat closed. The second I put it down the strap opens. The strap is also too small. Id you a Manduka Pro or GRP or other 85" mat the carry part of the strap end ups too short. Going to return.
customer_reviews.author: Sunil

customer_reviews.title: It is a very pretty strap and also sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Ok, the secret to this strap is that when you put it on your mat, put one end on and then put the other end on, but in the opposite "direction." When you do that it counters itself and stays put very tightly. I turned mine every which way and even shook it a bit and it did not budge. It is a very pretty strap and also sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: The strap is always falling off...
customer_reviews.text: This strap relies on tension in order to hold you mat in place. If you pick you mat up, by the mat itself (say, you're getting out of your car) the straps tend to fall off. Any time you hold you mat not by the straps, the straps will adjust on you and sometimes fall off. When they do fall off, the loop that was created to go around your mat has now collapsed and depending on what's in your hands, it's hard to open back up again to go around your mat. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Stigger

customer_reviews.title: I love Manduka products but hate this strap
customer_reviews.text: Hi all - last year I bought a different brand strap from Amazon. I lost it and decided to replace it with this Manduka. The ratings were strong and I'm happy with my Manduka Pro mat and my Manduka yoga strap. Compared to other straps - this one does not stay closed tightly. It's not that it falls apart immediately, but more that it doesn't stay secure as you pick up and put down the mat. (or perhaps, put it in your car or set it down in your office) Other straps stay together tighter and won't come loose on you. Manduka really dropped the ball (or the mat, as you will probably drop your mat with this strap.)
customer_reviews.author: Derrick J.

customer_reviews.title: Don't let it tilt, otherwise it's great
customer_reviews.text: Have to admit... I didn't read the full description and didn't realize this was JUST the strap (totally my fault.) That being said, I kept the strap to use on another mat I already had. I do like the padded area on the shoulder strap, but I wish the straps around the mat could tighten further. If the mat tilts while on your shoulder, it'll likely slip out of the loop and you drop your mat in the mud...like I did. Just something to be aware of, but like all Manduka products, it's great quality and I'll continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha V.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this yoga mat carrier
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this yoga mat carrier. I have the manduka pro mat and this carrier works perfectly. The pro mat is heavy, but this carrier is well made and can handle the weight of the mat. In my experience, It doesn't slide off of the mat when it is placed down. This carrier is super easy to put on and to take off. I highly recommend this carrier, especially if you own a manduka pro mat. Now that I own this yoga mat carrier, It is so much easier to carry my heavy yoga mat to and from the studio.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful how the strap is put on the mat
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice strap, great quality! The metal buckles of the strap may damage the edges of the mat depending on how the strap is tied around the mat. Avoid having the buckles by the mat edges. It damaged the edges of my brand new Manduka mat.
customer_reviews.author: CrissyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not what was pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Received today and the item received is not a “heather” colored strap and doesn’t have a herringbone weave in the photo. The strap sent to me was a dull grey color. The appearance is very different than what’s pictured. I also spent quite a bit of time figuring out how to use this with my mat. The instructions on the packaging are not helpful and neither are the product videos. I ended up figuring it out on my own with trial and error. Why make it so difficult for a customer to figure out how to use a product?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lacking in functionality
customer_reviews.text: So I looked a lot online to find a great carrier for my Manduka mat. This is not a good product. The strap in itself is good. Nothing wrong with the strap, but it's functionality is lacking. Each time you put your mat down with the strap around it, the strap will fall off, and you will need to out it on again. A tad bit annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza120

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat. I am new to yoga, so I used my wife’s 8 year old TJ Max special. She started me going to the local studio and they had Manduka mats, I loved the feel, the length, and that they do not slip. Because of the great experience, I got one for myself and one for her. Can’t go wrong with Manduka. It is a little more expensive then other mats, but as she has used the same mat for 8 years, I can tell you durability is important.
customer_reviews.author: Harris

customer_reviews.title: straps won't stay secure
customer_reviews.text: Aside from great quality, as soon as you set the mat with straps down, they open and fall off. When I bought this I assumed it has a double ring of some sort to secure strap tightly, as every other closure of this type does. I wish I had seen the elastic ones before buying this one! I don't know why anyone would like to deal with these straps all the time.....it completely goes against what the yoga experience is about!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and convenient way to carry your yoga mat.
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight way to carry your yoga mat. I live in the city and walk rather than drive to most places including my yoga studio. The yoga mat strap makes carrying my mat to class easy and effortless.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Tillman-Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Great function and price
customer_reviews.text: After buying my Manduka mat I found it bulky to carry under my arm and wanted a sling to make transport simpler. As usual, Manduka delivered! This is a simple design and works very well. I leave my mat in my car trunk when I'm not using it, and I haven't had any issues with it unrolling in the sling. Price is fair too!
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy strap design in a nice neutral gray. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy strap design in a nice, neutral light gray. Love it for my Maduka Pro Mat, which is quite heavy. I like this better than some of the other mat slings from Manduka because it's a bit wider of a strap and doesn't cut into the shoulder at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn DeVore

customer_reviews.title: I love that this does not use Velcro or buttons or ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that this does not use Velcro or buttons or anything like that, as I feel totally comfortable bringing this into the yoga room and putting it onto my mat without disturbing anyone around me in their meditation. Exactly what I was looking for considering I always walk to class!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Janisch

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and makes carrying my Manduka Pro mat a breeze
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and makes carrying my Manduka Pro mat a breeze. I had a cheap cloth carrier that ripped from carrying the Pro mat but this one is top notch and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Hallster12

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay tight! 👎🏼
customer_reviews.text: This strap is just ok. It’s thick and sturdy but it doesn’t stay tight. If my mat is traveling in the car beside me, I have to readjust the straps before grabbing it and exiting the car. It’s annoying!
customer_reviews.author: Neka05

customer_reviews.title: Falls off of mat
customer_reviews.text: This strap comes loose and falls off of my mat consistently, unless it's hanging off of my shoulder where gravity can hold it together. If it's laying on the ground it never seems to stay tight. The quality of materials is good, but the strap itself is annoying. Find a different strap...
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Nevinsky

customer_reviews.title: Durable and functional but tricky to use
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me. Because it is self-tightening, if you don’t carry the mat by the strap then the strap will come undone. When you set it down, it will loosen. Certainly not a deal breaker, just something to pay attention to when you are on the go. I carry the mat cross-body when riding my bike and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: LaMar

customer_reviews.title: Great Yoga Mat Strap
customer_reviews.text: This is a great basic yoga mat strap. It does not become loose when you put it down if used correctly, contrary to some of the negative comments of this product. It’s Iight weight and inexpensive in general and comparatively to other yoga mat straps I’ve seen.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Yoga Mat Sling
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sturdy, high-quality yoga mat sling with padded shoulder area and sturdy metal buckles. This is the second one I've purchased and am very pleased. I had a much lower quality velcro sling by another brand which was only slightly cheaper but not nearly as nice. (The velcro also wore out, so I had to throw it out.) I think this is very nice for the money. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: YHW

customer_reviews.title: great quality, no traction issues
customer_reviews.text: everything negative comment, though few, did not hold ground with my personal experience. The mat arrived ready to be broken in, no issues, weird smells or films, its perfectly as expected. A great product and so grateful they have the extra long mat for a 6'4 guy like me!
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed by the color, but great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression I was buying a black or gray strap, but received a navy one (maybe my computer's color was just off). It's not a big deal, so I decided to keep it, but it certainly doesn't match my yoga mat. Otherwise, it does seem durable and high-quality.
customer_reviews.author: An Actual Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: The commuter strap is well built, easy to use and a quick, convenient way to carry your mat. It showcases the Manduka logo, but does so with restraint. It is a simple design made of durable materials, allowing you to show off your mat rather than hiding it in a bag.
customer_reviews.author: TheOneEyedCat

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to a velcro fastened strap.
customer_reviews.text: Great little commuter strap. I walk about a mile to my yoga studio and this is comfortable enough for the journey. I wasn’t sure about the fasteners since they’re not velcro or buckles, but they hold well and keep my mat tightly rolled even when standing it upright on the floor. Plus, there’s no velcro noise - always awkward if you’re late to class.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great Strap
customer_reviews.text: this is working great. Understand some reviews about the straps coming loose but mine work great, however I'm just going from the car to the gym and not commuting with the pad
customer_reviews.author: lechien

customer_reviews.title: Amazing yoga mat
customer_reviews.text: Amazing yoga mat! Make sure to follow the instructions to season it or it will be too slippery! I practice yoga in a 100 year old barn so the floors are uneven wood. I dont even feel the floors through this mat! Really happy with this birthday gift!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bag O' Donuts

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier, awkward to get on and off
customer_reviews.text: My new mat is so thick that it wouldn’t fit into my old carrier, so this looked like the best solution. Other than being a little awkward to put on, it works well, and makes carrying the mat easy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CONSTANCE WALLEY

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my Manduka eKO Long Yoga Mat, Thunder, 5mm and it fits perfectly. Easy to pack my mat after class, and takes up hardly any room during class. Highly recommended for anyone with a heavier style mat.
customer_reviews.author: dauidus

customer_reviews.title: Well made, easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to be as cool as those yoga people at the studio who carry their mat through the grocery store after class. So I got a Manduka mat and one of these. It's well-made, and doesn't slip off the mat. It's a strap for your mat! Woot.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!!!
customer_reviews.text: False advertising! For the price I assumed this was a mat and strap as I’ve purchased one from a different seller cheaper. So when I go to return they are going to charge me $6.00?! What a joke there is no way this thing which is a tiny strap is going to cost this to ship back!! I’ve done multiple returns through amazon and never charged!!! Buyer beware!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MomChaosCoordinator

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, affordable, versatile, great bar with the bands!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrives quickly. Everything is fine. Very good quality and very effective. Such a good product is rare to find out. With this bar, I can do squats, lat pull downs, rows, and so much more. It’s sturdy and really well made. It’s a happy purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Chou

customer_reviews.title: Great add on to a new mat
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loves it! Makes its a lot easier to handle a high quality, heavier mat and just keeps everything more organized and uniform
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for a quality mat
customer_reviews.text: I have the manduca pro mat and it holds great. The heaviness of the mat keeps the straps tight and the grip of my mat keeps it in place. I like no latch feature cuz it’s easy to get on and off. I have noticed that middle part of the strap is twisting but not in a way that would make it unusable or uncomfortable. I happy with my purchase and I would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: geslyn

customer_reviews.title: Mat carrier
customer_reviews.text: It just doesn’t stay tight around my mat and I’ve almost lost it a couple times by dropping it. Wish it would lock in somehow.
customer_reviews.author: DIAN

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome strap with subtle textures worked into it. Very sturdy but not too bright and gaudy. Exactly my style
customer_reviews.author: Eva Ho

customer_reviews.title: It is good but it does not always stay put - it ...
customer_reviews.text: It is good but it does not always stay put - it needs to be carried for it to stay in the same place. If you place it down standing up, the strap tends to shake loose. Putting it on it's side seems to make it stay better.
customer_reviews.author: Nniiccoollee

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: good but not fantastic, the fall often, but they can double as a strap for helping feet or legs in to a asana, its good... but they are lose often
customer_reviews.author: RafaR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect strap for when I quickly grab my mat on the go. I love how it is no fuss and quiet, unlike Velcro straps. It uses the weight of the mat to stay together but doesn't unravel easily like I read in some reviews. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: they last
customer_reviews.text: ended up not using after awhile because of laziness on my part but used them for over 2 years. simple durable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Langer

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in Pilates and yoga class really liked the mat (even the instructors)
customer_reviews.author: ROGER HERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted a non toxic strong and sturdy mat that doesn’t move around on carpet. Fell in love w this mat!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Banana

customer_reviews.title: Just want I needed! And it’s worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Quality workmanship. Solid metal buckle and not cheap or coated. Easy on and off of the yoga mat. I also use it to stretch out.
customer_reviews.author: Caeli Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Ok for carrying, not great when storing the mat upright
customer_reviews.text: Good for carrying, but not good when you store it upright. Keeps sliding off the mat when putting it up.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Bornheim

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a good mat holder
customer_reviews.text: I really like that this is light & simplistic (compare to the Mandela bag I was using), but it’s a little annoying to put on. I feel the design could be better for the straps that go around the mat. Even so, overall I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaving strap
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't figure out how to put this on my mat at first since there were no instructions, but once I did I found it was the item I have been looking for since I first started doing yoga almost 9 years ago. Now, I can bring it to class along with everything else I usually bring without dropping anything.
customer_reviews.author: Joyola

customer_reviews.title: Slippery.
customer_reviews.text: My hands slip almost right away on this mat :( returned it after using it for a couple weeks. Kinda bummed
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect strao
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to carry my mat. It’s perfect for my somewhat heavier mat!
customer_reviews.author: Covaleen Pack

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice design. Very easy to attach to a rolled up matt and comfortable to carry. The buckle does not hold when it is not under tension, however. Need to remember that because one end sometimes slips off when standing the matt on end.
customer_reviews.author: RMS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and well made:. The soft reinforced cent r makes for easier shoulder carry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not that expensive but it’s so useful and cute
customer_reviews.text: Not that expensive but it’s so useful and cute. Friends asked me several times where did i get it :-)
customer_reviews.author: Leeazzi

customer_reviews.title: great length, and can double as a stretching strap ...
customer_reviews.text: great length, and can double as a stretching strap which is nice. so far I've been having trouble with it loosening from the mat every time i set it down. I would have liked if it were to stay fastened
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, but to short
customer_reviews.text: If you have a thick mat this strap will be to short.
customer_reviews.author: private

customer_reviews.title: Comes undone.  Useless
customer_reviews.text: Every time I use this, the straps don't stay cinched. Like someone else said, when I open my trunk, the strap completely loosens. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Orange County, CA

customer_reviews.title: Not good for thick/long mats
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Manduka Pro mat and this strap to carry it and was disappointed with the strap. The width is too thin to comfortably carry on shoulder, strap too short, and the metal ends cut into my mat making a dent. I ended up using my old lulu strap for my new mat, more comfortable and easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Manduka does it again
customer_reviews.text: This is a great high quality product. I love this strap.
customer_reviews.author: Hawley D

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Works well for me. All I have to do is wrap it around my yoga mat!
customer_reviews.author: Sebz

customer_reviews.title: The strap is not easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: The strap is not easy to set up. Lost the instructions and have a hard time putting the thing together again. No help on either their website or on youtube. Fail for Manduka. Would not buy again unless you are Mcgyver.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Br

customer_reviews.title: love it and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and works quickly to get my yoga mat secured and ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: I'd be happier with it if I had received the color I ...
customer_reviews.text: I'd be happier with it if I had received the color I ordered (I received the light grey instead of the navy). The strap works fine but I needed it soon so I did not have time to deal with returning it and waiting for the correct item. The one star is for receiving the wrong item.
customer_reviews.author: bo iniguez

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's cotton and a simple design. The only downside is that the loops sometimes loosen up and shift or fall off when gravity is not holding them in place, which means I have to be careful when I'm first putting the strap on the rolled mat.
customer_reviews.author: said no one ever

customer_reviews.title: Simple but great!
customer_reviews.text: Simple yet effective way to carry my ProLite mat. I can put it on very quickly (and of course take it off just as fast) and the straps are nice and soft. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kim P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and handy - get it?
customer_reviews.text: This strap makes taking my yoga mat around with me easy as pie. TY :)
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Molina

customer_reviews.title: Novice
customer_reviews.text: Duh! My original review was for the mat. The strap is wonderful. It can even be used to assist during yoga for someone who is 6'4.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Viel

customer_reviews.title: High quality, adjustable size.
customer_reviews.text: This is a basic yoga mat strap made by a trusted company. Fits the manduka pro mat just fine, too.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect carrying strap!
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling with a "too small" strap for my Manduka Mat for years. Someone walked into a class with this great "easy on/ easy off" carrying strap and I ordered it immediately! What a difference! So glad I found this!
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use strap
customer_reviews.text: This strap works really well with my yoga mat. It is very simple in its approach to get on and off. You don't have to deal with a big bulky bag and where to put the bag during class. I don't have a Manduka mat to match but who cares.
customer_reviews.author: WIBadgerFan

customer_reviews.title: Useless - loops fall off.
customer_reviews.text: The loops don't stay tight around the mat, it falls off all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love the strap the way it fastens on easily but it falls off when the mat is standing on its end.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend a bag over a strap
customer_reviews.text: The strap is just okay. It doesn't cinch the mat tightly enough and often comes loose. Would recommend a bag over a strap.
customer_reviews.author: jenuine

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Soft natural feel, doesn't dig into my shoulders even carrying around a 7 plus pound yoga mat for two very long blocks to my local studio
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Maynor

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use ~ love that there are no noises when using it. Yogi ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Old Fashioned

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty strap!
customer_reviews.text: I have a professional size mat that is very heavy. This strap holds it well! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: ADK

customer_reviews.title: Sleek design, excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I love how this strap doesn’t have excess buckles or attachments. It makes carrying my mat extremely comfortable and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: The strap is sturdy yet soft to the touch. It keeps my extra thick yoga mat secure in transport and doubles as a nice stretch strap during yoga practice. I have not washed it yet because it doesn’t look dirty even with a light gray color.
customer_reviews.author: Edamame

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely recommended. It is perfect for carrying mat to yoga class. Adjustable, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Pom

customer_reviews.title: Slips
customer_reviews.text: This product slips off of my manduka mat. The loops do not keep and tight grip on the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Reid

customer_reviews.title: I use this to secure my exercise mat around a ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this to secure my exercise mat around a foam roller for traveling to and from my M.E.L.T. class. Minimalistic solution and helps to keep my hands free.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Golden

customer_reviews.title: Goes Great with the Manduka Mat
customer_reviews.text: It's a little pricey, but since I was spending the money on the Manduka Pro Lite Mat, it made sense to get the Manduka sling. It's extremely well made and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Barbus

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, love how small it is. Makes carrying my mat much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Chima

customer_reviews.title: Durable and reliable and will fit any mat
customer_reviews.text: Love my yoga holder. Worked on my mat but will work on any mat. Won't have to buy another one due to durability and longevity this will have
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: I like the idea of the strap
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of the strap, however without constant tension within the loops, they come loose and slide around or off of the mat altogether while transporting it.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Mat slips out
customer_reviews.text: The design leaves something to be desired. It easy fir the mat to slip out if there is slack.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Lewis Esq

customer_reviews.title: Versatile for Commuting Yoginis
customer_reviews.text: Easy adjustments and quick loop action for your yoga mat. Comfortable strap with padding makes for on-the-go motion. Carry ocer the shoulder or cross body. Plenty of strap length to adjust to a thick mat! Can trouble for stretching. Love the logo too.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Shimizu

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga mat!
customer_reviews.text: Love this yoga mat! Have recommended it to all my friends! My instructor just bought it!
customer_reviews.author: prettipatty191

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for large people.
customer_reviews.text: Worked out perfect me. I am 6’1” 295lbs and need the size and thickness to cushion me.
customer_reviews.author: siegelspal

customer_reviews.title: I really like this strap
customer_reviews.text: I really like this strap, but as other reviews have stated, it would be nice if there was something to hold it in place once it's on your mat. Otherwise it does get loose and tend to fall off when you place your mat down.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Mat Supreme
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect there to be that much difference in a yoga mat but this one is of great benefit to both the beginner and the pro.
customer_reviews.author: Steinbecks Shadow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, no problem with my mat slipping. Perfect for easy on and easy off use.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I have the Manduaka LiveOn PLUSfoam Yoga Mat
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have the Manduaka LiveOn PLUSfoam Yoga Mat, 5mm thickness. It fits with out a problem and comfortable to carry. I have no problems with the mat slipping out or the sling becoming loose.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good buy! Very sturdy, easy to use, and provide plenty padding for the shoulder!
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Pleasing design built sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a Velcro one with this one. Simple, effective design. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Webb

customer_reviews.title: Not practical! Get a better one.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like it. It’s just a strap that you have to put together every time in order to carry your mat. Should have spent a little more and gotten a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Najkar

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on my Manduka mat. I like the cotton part that goes along the shoulder while I am carrying it. It makes my PRO mat feel like nothing.
customer_reviews.author: houghlepuff

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this strap. Its slightly padded for your shoulder. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: HANDY WAY TO TRANSPORT YOUR YOGA MAT
customer_reviews.text: THIS MAKES CARRYING MY YOGA MAT MUCH EASIER. I USE IT EVERYDAY THAT I GO TO YOGA.
customer_reviews.author: David221

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect -- heavy cotton that GRIPS. A shoulder pad. What more do you need?
customer_reviews.author: Agix

customer_reviews.title: Great mat sling
customer_reviews.text: Great for carrying mat to studio, so much easier than just rolling up the mat and hoping it stays closed. Will probably get a mat bag however, once you realize all the stuff you have to carry to class, the sling takes care of the mat but that's it.
customer_reviews.author: SammyA

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat! It is holding up great thru many yoga classes and going in and out of my car.
customer_reviews.author: J. Spitz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sling for Mats and Stretches
customer_reviews.text: Love this yoga strap, it’s strong and double as strap for stretching. I’m ordering it again for other mats.
customer_reviews.author: JR

product_meta.title: Manduka Journey On Commuter Yoga Mat Carrier, Adjustable Cotton Strap, Suitable for all Yoga Mats
product_meta.description:
* For information on how Manduka contributes to the community, please visit the About page
 * Whether you are traveling to the studio or taking your practice on the road, the Commuter from Manduka® will keep you moving. 
 * No noise, no hook and loop, no snaps or buckles. Simply loop it around the mat and let gravity do the work.
 * Hands free yoga mat carrier. 
 * Comfy, durable and it can fit all mats. 
 * Easy closure gravity cinch. 
 * Padded shoulder strap for ultimate comfort. 
 * Color contrasting twill details throughout. 
 * One size: 68" L x 1.5" W.
 * Wash on delicate cycle, tumble dry low. 
 * Imported.
feature_bullets: Designed to fit mats of any size, the Commuter mat carrier is an alternative that keeps your yoga mat easily accessible and at your side for all occasions.
Made from natural cotton twill and webbing.
Gravity cinch closure is easy and noise free! No Velcro, snaps, or buckles to disrupt your practice -- or anybody else's. Simply loop it around each end of your mat and let gravity do its work.
To Clean: Wash on delicate cycle and tumble dry on low. *Please note: Hardware may begin to rust after multiple washes.
Does not include the Yoga mat
